name: Subfield.charP
initialProofState:
F : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field F
L : Subfield F
p : Nat
inst✝ : CharP F p
⊢ CharP (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem L x) p
decl: instance charP [CharP F p] : CharP L p := RingHom.charP _ (algebraMap _ F).injective p

name: Subfield.expChar
initialProofState:
F : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field F
L : Subfield F
p : Nat
inst✝ : ExpChar F p
⊢ ExpChar (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem L x) p
decl: instance expChar [ExpChar F p] : ExpChar L p := RingHom.expChar _ (algebraMap _ F).injective p

name: IntermediateField.charZero
initialProofState:
F : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝³ : Field F
inst✝² : Field E
inst✝¹ : Algebra F E
L : IntermediateField F E
inst✝ : CharZero F
⊢ CharZero (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem L x)
decl:
instance charZero [CharZero F] : CharZero L :=
  charZero_of_injective_algebraMap (algebraMap F _).injective

name: IntermediateField.charP'
initialProofState:
F : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝³ : Field F
inst✝² : Field E
inst✝¹ : Algebra F E
L : IntermediateField F E
p : Nat
inst✝ : CharP E p
⊢ CharP (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem L x) p
decl: instance charP' [CharP E p] : CharP L p := Subfield.charP L.toSubfield p
